Description:
Uncompromised Space & Versatility on Approx 571sqm!
Absolute family perfection, this amazing 4 bedroom home is set on a huge block of land delivering a ready-to-enjoy lifestyle with its flexible floorplan, premium inclusions & immaculate garden surrounds.
Designed & built for ultimate family enjoyment, the home's impressive interior comprises a large master bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite, 3 additional bedrooms (all with built-in robes), main central bathroom & separate WC.
Spacious & versatile, the home's three distinct living zones include expansive open-plan family/dining area, light-filled rumpus/theatre room & a conveniently placed kids retreat, plus the added appeal of a superb stone-bench kitchen complete with stainless steel appliances & excellent storage.
Other stand-out features include high ceilings, high doors, ducted heating & evaporative cooling family laundry & linen storeroom, 1.5KW solar system, Class A recycle water, plus 2 large outdoor decked entertaining areas (1 undercover), wonderfully wide backyard garden, sideway storage shed & internally-accessed double garage (remote-control)
Easy access to the very best of Craigieburn including popular schools, kinder/childcare services, public transport, aquatic centre & Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre & much more.
Insights: 33 Wattletree Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Warm and Inviting!!
Here is your chance to secure a spacious family home in a highly sought after location. From the moment you step inside you will feel like home, from space, character, class and warm and inviting feeling this home brings.
Comprising of 3 excellent size bedrooms plus open study, master with full ensuite. Offering a spacious open floor plan, good size kitchen that includes stainless steel appliances with ample cupboard space and bench space.
Extras include: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, fire place all set on a spectacular size block of land measuring 707m2 approx.
Location speaks for itself close to Mother Teresa Catholic Crimary School, Highgate recreation reserve, Mount Ridley College, Craigieburn Primary School, Hume HWY plus walk ways and parks.
Call today to inspect.

Description:
Bright & Spacious In Elite Location
With an abundance of natural light, spacious living and ample accommodation, this outstanding residence offers plenty of room for the growing family. From the moment you step inside you will appreciate the flexible floor plan that allows the family to interact yet provides space for those who appreciate their privacy. Perfect for those who like to entertain all year round complete with alfresco area and great size perfectly manicured back yard. Comprising of ducted heating, evaporative cooling, formal lounge/over sized study, kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances, dishwasher & walk in pantry, meals area with adjoining family room, rumpus room or optional 4th bedroom, master with full ensuite and walk in robe, double lock up garage with remote control & internal access, endless amounts of storage and all this on a large parcel of land. Ideally located within walking distance to public transport, local shops, parkland & Mount Ridley College. Don't let this opportunity pass you buy.

Description:
1 Angophora Crescent, Craigieburn - East Facing Brand New Home
Ticks all the buyer's wish list
1. Land size - 360 sqm
2. 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms & double garage
3. 15 mins walk to Newbury Primary School
4. Bus stop to Craigieburn train station at 15 mins walk
5. Plus, if you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG!!
Only 5% to secure the property and balance on settlement!!
Mike Sarupria presents 1 Angophora Crs, Craigieburn built by Porter Davis in the prestigious Highlands estate & only a short drive to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Highlands Shopping Centre & schools.
This brand new home comes equipped with luxury turn-key inclusions such as professionally styled interior colour themes, stone bench tops, carpets, tiles, higher ceilings and much more. Front landscaping, driveway and quality flooring are also all included in this beautiful home.
1 Angophora Crs Features:
- 4 spacious bedrooms, master will full double vanity ensuite and walk in robe remaining 3 bedrooms with built in robes.
- Well-equipped kitchen & stainless steel cooking appliances including 900 mm gas cook top, range hood, dishwasher, walk in pantry and island bench.
- Open plan living space comprising spacious dining and living area adjacent kitchen.
- Modern central bathroom.
- Spacious laundry
- Central ducted heating and provision for evaporative cooling
- Concrete perimeter around the house and security alarm
- Remote control double car garage and much more!
Call Mike on 0430 126 491 or Frank on 0426 425 361 now for further information or to arrange an inspection.
Photo ID must be presented upon all open & private inspections.
Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List:
www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions are approximate only. Back landscaping is for illustration purpose only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent

Sensational Value For Money
This conveniently located home will prove to be a great addition to your portfolio or perhaps the perfect first home.
Comprising of a generous living area with lots of sunlight, meals area, heating & cooling, 3 generous sized bedrooms accompanied by a central bathroom. Floorboards throughout and carpet in all bedrooms, this home is ready for you to move in!
Outside features a low maintenance rear yard with plenty of room for entertaining and garden shed.
Located in close proximity to Craigieburn Station, Craigieburn Secondory College, easy access to Bridgewater Road and all other amenities
Dont miss out on this opportunity! Bring your whole family they will love it too!

Charming and Admirable!
With its charming street appeal, this home is ideal for first home buyers, downsizers and investors. This charismatic property showcases a master bedroom featuring a walk in robe and shared bathroom, additional bedroom with built in robe, kitchen featuring walk in pantry and stainless steel appliances overlooking the living and dining area with raised ceilings. Outside you can enjoy the beautiful weather in your delightful courtyard with access to the double car garage. Extras include ducted heating, split system cooling, European laundry and remote control garage. Currently leased out $1,456 per calendar month potential investors can have rental income from day one. Do not miss this opportunity to secure this unique opportunity.

Description:
Stunning & Convenient 2-Storey Townhouse!
This immaculately kept 2-bedroom townhouse offers convenient 2-storey living in one of Craigieburns most sought-after and well-connected locations!
In walking distance from schools, shops and public transport this is the perfect first home or a fantastic addition to any investment portfolio.
The townhouse boasts 2 large bedrooms serviced by a central upstairs bathroom, as well as a spacious light-filled kitchen with modern stainless steel appliances adjacent to dining and family areas.
Enjoy a sunny landscaped courtyard with rear access provided by the secure single carport with roller door. Additional features of the property include heating and air conditioning, a small storage room, roller blinds on all windows and a downstairs powder room.
This convenient townhouse is in close proximity to Craigieburn Central, Craigieburn Junction, Highlands Shopping Centre, Highlands Hotel and a whole host of local schools, shops, cafés, parks, reserves and public transport.
Call Mario Pejovski on 0490 815 914 to claim this stunning property in an unbeatable location!
Features
- 2-Storey 2-Bedroom Townhouse
- Walking Distance To Shops, Schools & Transport
- Large Kitchen With Stainless Steel Appliances
- Central Bathroom & Powder Room
- European Laundry
- Landscaped Courtyard With Water Tank
- Secure Single Carport With Remote Roller Door
Internal area
115m²

Set on a whisper-quiet street so close to lush parkland, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre and Splash Aqua Leisure Centre, this one has it all!
For more information, please contact Alex Melnychuk today.

Description:
Dream Home Close to Train Station...!!!
Universal Real Estate Vic proudly presents this conveniently positioned house with Walking distance to Craigieburn Train Station, Craigieburn Primary and Secondary Schools. If you are considering buying your first home or simply looking for an investment with an easy access to the best of Craigieburn, then don't miss out on this one. This is a marvellous home situated on a massive block will impress you and your family.
SPECIFICATIONS:
- BEDROOMS: 3 Spacious Bedrooms (Master Bedroom with BIR and Full Ensuite, other 2 Bedrooms with BIR and serviced by a central bathroom).
- KITCHEN: Spacious Open Plan Living/ Dining Kitchen with 900 mm Stainless Steel Appliances, large benchtops, Electric Oven, Dishwasher, Double Fridge Space and ample cupboard space.
- LIVING AREA: Open Plan Living/Dining and Formal Lounge.
- HEAT/COOL: Ducted Heating and Evaporative Cooling.
- LAUNDRY: Spacious Laundry with ample cupboard space.
- BACKYARD: Immaculate and well maintained Garden with outer door entertainment area.
- BALI HUT: Beautifully designed Bali Hut will give you feeling that you are in another world. The Family Entertainment with Bar is an added feature to this lifestyle property.
- ADDITIONAL INCLUSIONS: Concreted Car Space , Steel Fencing, Extra Heating Units in Entertainment area, Linen Cabinets, Glass Vanity and Massive Mirror in living area with built in Cabinets.
SCHOOLS:
-Craigieburn Primary School .........0.3km
-Craigieburn Secondary School....0.34km
- Roxburgh Rise Primary School...1.38km
-Willmot Park Primary School........1.94km
- LOCATION: Walking distance to Mitford Kinder, Football Ground and Craigieburn Train Station. Close proximity to Our Lady Primary School, Willmott Primary School, Craigieburn Plaza, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Craigieburn Junction, Craigieburn Golf Course Supermarkets, Gym, Splash Aqua Park, Leisure Centre. Easy access to bus stops, beautiful parklands, Child Cares, Service Stations, Restaurants/CafÃ© and Hume Freeway.
If you're in the market for that perfect all round property, then look no further than this.
Don't miss out! Call Achal Arora - 0432 413 929 or Robbie Sandhu -0466 074 580.

Description:
Proudly Presented With Location To Match...
From the moment you step inside you will be impressed with the quality & style that this family home has to offer. With a vibrant, charismatic personality & cleverly designed home which delivers easy, practical & flexible living for all. Comprising of open plan kitchen with dishwasher & stainless steel appliances overlooking the meals/family area, master bedroom with walk in robe, single remote carport, ducted heating & evaporative cooling, plus much more. Step outside and you will find an entertainers delight, complete with under cover alfresco & surrounded by low maintenance landscaped gardens & garden shed. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all the amenities close by including a short stroll to parkland, local schools, public transport & the Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre. Be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!
Insights: 17 Gippsland Way, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Contact CRAIG FROST on 0413018033 for a PRIVATE INSPECTION
We invite you to contact us on 0413 018 033 with any enquiries and to arrange a private inspection of this property as no open homes are scheduled. In the meantime, we would like to let you know a little bit more about this property.
This beautifully presented three bedroom home offers a functional floorplan with a generous open plan living, kitchen and dining area, serving as the main hub of the home. The kitchen meets high expectations with breakfast bar, stone bench tops, stainless steel range hood and sink, large fridge space and deep walk in pantry with additional bench space and shelving.
The open plan living and dining area looks out onto the covered outdoor entertaining area with built in bbq, the ideal place to end a long day. The rear yard beyond offers low maintenance gardening with a small grassed area, bird avery, cubby house, garden shed and clothes line. The side of the home with concrete surface provides a desirable space to store outdoor items or small trailer.
The main bedroom located at the front of the house is complimented with a sliding robe and ensuite, complete with tiled shower, duel vanity basin, under bench cabinetry and toilet. The two additional bedrooms share the family bathroom, including bath, shower, vanity basin, under bench storage and separate toilet.
Additional extras include vertical blinds, dual blinds, tiled wet areas, freshly paint, single lock up garage and landscaped gardens. Located in a leafy street on approximately 294sqm, the new owner will appreciate being close to public transport (bus 529 533) (Craigieburn train station), fast food outlets, shopping precincts including Craigieburn central, primary and secondary schools, reserves, parklands and childcare.
Additional extras include solar panels, ducted heating, split system heating and cooling, alarm system, security cameras linked to mobile phone app, vertical blinds, tiled wet areas and fresh paint.
A note to buyers
We base our price ranges on comparable sales within the area and current market conditions. We do not over quote property to vendors or underquote property to buyers. We recognise that the final sale price will ultimately be influenced by competition within the market and that the advertised selling range is not a ceiling to the price buyers may be willing to pay to secure the purchase of the property.
Frost Real Estate is pleased to be able to offer our buyers complete dedication to your discrete purchasing experience. Every interested buyer is invited to put their best offer forward for the property with the knowledge that offers will not be disclosed between buyers. At the heart of Frost Real Estate is a passion for helping people enjoy the experience of purchasing and selling property. We hope that this information helps you with your property search.
While every effort has been made to provide the correct description of the property and identify the properties features, we advise you to conduct an inspection of the property for your own satisfaction. Please contact Craig Frost on 0413 018 033 for further information and to arrange a private inspection.
Insights: 30 Taylan Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Flexibility with Mt. Ridley Prestige
Occupying an exceptionally wide allotment (640m2 approx) in a peaceful no through road in Mt Ridley & surrounded by beautifully presented homes & gardens, this distinctive double-storey 4 bedroom, 3 bathroom home assures a fine family lifestyle with its indoor versatility & impressive outdoor space.
Offering 4 big bedrooms, luxurious ensuite with spa & double shower, separate study or potential 5th bedroom, generous formal lounge & dining, kitchen with stainless steel appliances, adjoining meals, large family room, an additional rumpus/games room upstairs & double remote garage with internal access & drive through to the rear yard to a colossal pergola area.
Further features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm, CCTV cameras, garden shed, family-sized laundry, beautifully landscaped gardens & much much more.
Positioned in the prestigious Mt Ridley Estate, it's within walking distance to all surrounding amenities including shops, Hume Anglican Grammar, cafes, public transport, parkland & very easy access to Hume Fwy and a short drive to Craigieburn central shopping centre & train station.
With a real emphasis on space & room to grow, why would you consider building when all the space you could ever need is on offer here.
Insights: 8 Strathallan Grove, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.
